content:
"Have you eaten yet?"
They say this is a popular afternoon greeting in an Eastern Astralink,
Though I heard they've switched to "Have you ordered yet?" these days.
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Seems like it's because of those food delivery apps...
Everyone's eating habits
are really becoming quite different these days.
info: 闲聊-中午（11-14）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊
